item.title: Getting started with recyclerview
item.description: Installation & Setup # The display of elements in a list or grids is a very common pattern in mobile applications. The user sees a collection of items and can scroll through them. The collection of items can be a list, a grid or another structured representations of data. The RecyclerView widget is a more advanced and flexible version of ListView. This widget is a container for displaying large data sets that can be scrolled very efficiently by maintaining a limited number of views.
